H0.text: On which island is the city of Knossos, once the capital of the ancient Minoan civilisation. Rhodes

H1.text: On which island is the city of Knossos, once the capital of the ancient Minoan civilisation. Lesbos

H2.text: On which island is the city of Knossos, once the capital of the ancient Minoan civilisation. Chios

H3.text: On which island is the city of Knossos, once the capital of the ancient Minoan civilisation. Krete

A4.text: Knossos is a Bronze Age archaeological site in Crete.
